description.Double Sausage: The next Snack Attack only heals allies but doubles the amount.
description.Extra Mustard: The next Snack Attack only damages enemies but doubles the amount.
description.Replanting: Cordelius jumps over a piece of terrain quickly.
description.Poison Mushroom: Cordelius's next main attack shoots a poison mushroom that prevents the enemy from attacking for x seconds.
description.Water Balloons: The next Balloon Blast also slows down enemies for x seconds.
description.Barricade: Hank takes x% reduced damage for x seconds.
description.Disengage: Maisie blasts the ground, stunning enemies for x seconds while dashing forward.
description.Finish Them: Maisie instantly reloads x ammo and increases the next Pressure Rocket damage by x% of the target's missing HP.
description.Spellbound: Willow's next Lantern's Curse deals x more damage and applies the entire damage instantly rather than over time.
description.Dive: Willow dives for x seconds, becoming untargetable but unable to take any action for the duration.
description.In Line: R-T signals his legs while split, damaging enemy brawlers in between for x and slowing them.
description.Hacks: Instantly trigger all active marks on all enemy brawlers, dealing their damage.
description.Caramelize: Mandy's next candy from her Candy Dispenser slows down enemies on hit for x seconds.
description.Cookie Crumbs: Mandy's next candy from her Candy Dispenser pierces enemies and environment.
description.Walking Cane: Gray's next hit from the Finger Pistol shoots a walking cane which pulls enemies back by a bit.
description.Grand Piano: Gray's next hit from the Finger Pistol will also leave a target on the ground where a piano will land and hurt enemies. It would be too bad if someone would get hurt, right?
description.Spicy Dice: Chester gets a new random Super that is different from his current one.
description.Candy Beans: Chester eats a mystery flavored candy bean from his cap, gaining a random buff for x seconds.
description.Utility Belt: Buster heals himself and all nearby allies for x health for each ally in his Super's charge area.
description.Slo-Mo Replay: Buster's next Lens Flare pulls enemies towards him and slows them down for x seconds.
description.Kooky Popper: Explode all uncollected spirits, dealing x damage to nearby enemies.
description.Soul Switcher: Gus loses <ccc0000>x% health but gains x% spirit instantly.
description.Magnetic Field: While the Knuckle Busters are on the ground, Sam can activate them to pull in nearby enemies.
description.Pulse Repellent: Upon landing on the ground, Sam's next deployed Knuckle Busters releases an electric pulse that knocks back enemies.
description.Dormant Star: The next starfish will stay on the ground if an enemy is not hit, laying dormant until an enemy gets close.
description.Phat Splatter: Otis's next attack shoots a giant ink ball that leaves a puddle, dealing x damage over time for x seconds.
description.Sugar Rush: Clyde's movement and reload speed are increased by x% for x seconds.
description.Crash Test: Bonnie dashes forward, knocking back enemies and dealing x damage on hit.
description.Drop The Bass: Janet deploys a speaker that deals x damage per second to all enemies in the area until it gets destroyed.
description.Backstage Pass: Janet's next High Note pushes her back, even over walls. The more focused her attack is, the further she'll be pushed back.
description.Gotta Go: Eve jumps away and leaves behind a hatchling.
description.Motherly Love: Hatchlings spawned from an active big egg will now heal allies over time instead of dealing damage.
description.Corn-Fu: Fang tosses a handful of corn kernels into the air, making it rain popcorn! Each kernel pop deals x damage.
description.Roundhouse Kick: Fang spins and hits all enemies around him, stunning them for x seconds.
description.Freeze Frame: Lola's Ego stops moving to strike a pose! Gaining a x% shield for x seconds.
description.Stunt Double: Lola and her Ego switch locations. She recovers x health.
description.Jolting Volts: Heal the Mecha by x health per second for x seconds.
description.Toolbox: Meg drops her toolbox, which increases the reload speed for nearby allies by x% until it gets destroyed.
description.Chill Pill: Though furious, Ash has to collect himself. A full Rage meter will recover x health when this gadget is popped - less Rage, less recovery.
description.Rotten Banana: Ash loses <ccc0000>x% health and instantly gains x% rage.
description.Piggy Bank: Griff drops a firecracker-filled piggy bank that explodes after a short delay, destroying obstacles and dealing x damage to opponents within range.
description.Coin Shower: Griff's next Coin Toss shoots x% more coins.
description.Reserve Buoy: Instantly fills the Super meter, but the next Torpedo Throw doesn't stun opponents.
description.X-Ray-Shades: Buzz can see into all bushes in his Super charging area for x seconds.
description.Watchtower: Grom ejects a Watchtower from his Grom Bomb that gives all allies sight into bushes over a large area. The watchtower slowly loses health over time.
description.Radio Check: Grom's next attack throws x Buds in rapid succession.
description.Windup: Squeak's next Sticky Blomb deals x% more damage and has x% longer range.
description.Residue: Squeak's next Sticky Blomb leaves an residue area behind after exploding, slowing down enemies and giving allies sight into bushes for x seconds.
description.Nest Egg: Belle places a trap on the ground that will explode when triggered by an opponent. The trap deals x damage, and slows down anyone within its blast radius for x seconds.
description.Reverse Polarity: Belle's next Electro-Bolt bounces from walls.
description.Speed Zone: Stu drops a booster that makes himself, his teammates and other allies move faster while inside its area of effect.
description.Breakthrough: Stu's next Super can bash through obstacles, making debris fly forward. Each piece of debris deals x damage to any opponent it hits.
description.Take Cover: Ruffs throws down x sandbags as cover. Each one has x health.
description.Air Support: Ruffs calls a barrage around the nearest opponent, dealing x damage with each hit.
description.Lets Fly: Edgar's Super charges faster, x% for x seconds.
description.Hardcore: Edgar gets a shield that protects him from the next x damage. The shield gets weaker over time.
description.Shot In The Arm: Byron uses one of his shots to heal himself x per second for x seconds.
description.Booster Shots: Byron's next attack shoots x darts instead of one, each dealing <ccc0000>x% less damage and <ccc0000>x% less healing.
description.Ice Block: Lou shields himself with ice, becoming invulnerable for x seconds.
description.Cryo Syrup: Instantly adds x% freeze meter to opponents inside Lou's Super.
description.Fire Starters: Amber runs fast for x seconds while spilling her fire fluid, which she can then ignite.
description.Dancing Flames: Amber creates x orbiting flames around her for x seconds, dealing x damage on hit.
description.Na-Ah: Colette's next shot deals extra x damage.
description.Gotcha: On activation, Colette's shots heal herself for x seconds for x% of the damage dealt.
description.Power Surge: Surge overloads his circuits and increases his upgrade level by x for x seconds.
description.Power Shield: Within the next x seconds, Surge consumes x% of the damage of the next incoming hit and uses the energy to reload x ammo.
description.Garden Mulcher: Sprout consumes a bush to restore x health.
description.Transplant: Sprout destroys its current Hedge, but will instantly have its Super fully charged again.
description.Warp Blast: Nani detonates Peep and teleports to his last location.
description.Return To Sender: For the next x seconds, the first time Nani takes damage from an enemy, x% of the damage is returned to the enemy.
description.Spring Ejector: Gale drops a bounce pad underfoot, launching friend and foe alike into the air.
description.Twister: Gale uses his leaf blower to create a local tornado, which will push away any opponents that try to pass through.
description.Pneumatic Booster: Jacky gets a burst of energy and moves x% faster for x seconds.
description.Rebuild: Jacky rebuilds the environment in a small radius around her.
description.Phase Shifter: Max dashes forward, and becomes immune to all damage from enemies while dashing.
description.Sneaky Sneakers: Max blinks back to a place of her choosing after x seconds' delay, recovering any damage she received in the meantime.
description.Service Bell: Mr. P buffs his current porter by increasing its damage by x and health by x.
description.Porter Reinforcements: The next attack will spawn a weak porter where the attack lands.
description.Friendzoner: Emz pushes back all enemies around her while also dealing x damage.
description.Acid Spray: Emz's next blast of hair spray can pass through walls, but deals <ccc0000>x% less damage.
description.Honey Molasses: Bea drops a beehive with a splash of sticky honey around it. The honey slows down enemies that step in it.
description.Rattled Hive: Bea unleashes x angry bees that circle away from her, dealing more damage the further they go (up to x damage).
description.Sleep Stimulator: Sandy falls asleep for x seconds and his health is fully restored.
description.Sweet Dreams: Sandy's next attack lulls opponents to sleep for x seconds. They will, however, wake up from any damage.
description.Cheat Cartridge: 8-Bit instantly teleports to his Damage Booster.
description.Extra Credits: 8-Bit's next attack has the number of projectiles increased to x.
description.Vitamin Booster: Bibi heals x health per second for x seconds.
description.Extra Sticky: Bibi's next Spitball slows down enemies on hit for x seconds!
description.Heat Ejector: The next pickaxe Carl throws will drop a trail of hot rocks behind it! Opponents that touch them are set on fire, and receive a total of x damage over time.
description.Flying Hook: Carl's next attack makes his pickaxe pull him to the farthest point of the attack.
description.Grow Light: Rosa fertilizes the ground around her and bushes instantly grow to provide great cover.
description.Unfriendly Bushes: All opponents hiding in bushes take x damage and get slowed down for x seconds.
description.Clone Projector: Leon creates an illusion of himself to confuse his enemies.
description.Lollipop Drop: Leon creates a stealthy area for his team to hide in. The lollipop slowly loses its health over time.
description.Mine Mania: Tick's next attack fires x mines.
description.Last Hurrah: Tick gains a x% shield for x seconds. After that, it bursts out for x damage.
description.Lamp Blowout: All enemies close to Gene are instantly pushed back. If at least one enemy Brawler is within range, Gene will also restore x health.
description.Vengeful Spirits: Gene shoots a homing missile at all visible opponents within a large area, dealing up to x damage based on distance.
description.Active Noise Canceling: Frank clears any disabling effect on himself, and momentarily becomes immune to stuns, slows and knockbacks.
description.Irresistible Attraction: Frank's next attack deals an extra x% damage and pulls opponents towards him.
description.Salty Barrel: Penny drops a barrel of salt that blocks enemy projectiles. She can also use it to burst her own gold pouches.
description.Trusty Spyglass: Penny's cannon blasts at every visible enemy position within range.
description.Recoiling Rotator: Darryl spins around and sprays a barrage of shots in all directions. Each shot deals x damage and recharges his Super by x% if it hits enemies!
description.Tar Barrel: Darryl creates a slowing area around himself for x seconds.
description.Psychic Enhancer: Tara and her allies are able to see all enemies, even inside bushes, for x seconds.
description.Support From Beyond: Tara surrounds herself with three weak shadows that attack opponents and disappear after x seconds.
description.Pulse Modulator: Pam triggers her turret to emit a pulse that heals allies inside the turret's range, including herself, for x health.
description.Scrapsucker: Each hit from Pam's next attack removes x% of opposing Brawlers' maximum ammo. Pam reclaims x% of the ammo for herself.
description.Auto Aimer: Piper pops a defensive shot at the closest enemy, dealing x damage, while also pushing them back and slowing them down.
description.Homemade Recipe: On activation, Piper's next main attack will home in on enemies.
description.Super Totem: Bo places a totem that increases allies' Super charging rate by x%. The totem slowly loses its health over time.
description.Tripwire: Bo triggers all of his mines after x seconds. During the delay the mines are completely undetectable to opponents.
description.Tuning Fork: Poco and all nearby allies heal x health per second for x seconds.
description.Protective Tunes: Removes active adverse effects from friendly Brawlers in a large area and gives a x second immunity.
description.Defense Booster: Crow gets a shield for x% of incoming damage for x seconds.
description.Slowing Toxin: All currently poisoned enemies are slowed for x seconds.
description.Combo Spinner: Mortis spins his shovel, hitting all enemies around himself for x damage.
description.Survival Shovel: Mortis reloads faster for x seconds.
description.Suplex Supplement: El Primo grabs the closest enemy within his reach and flips them like a pancake over his broad shoulders.
description.Asteroid Belt: El Primo summons a small meteor to strike the nearest enemy. It deals x damage and destroys walls.
description.Fidget Spinner: Dynamike spins furiously with increased movement speed and throws multiple sticks of dynamite around himself. Each dynamite deals x damage to enemies.
description.Satchel Charge: Once activated, the next main attack also stuns enemies for x seconds.
description.Bear Paws: Nita commands her bear to slam the ground, stunning all enemies within its reach.
description.Faux Fur: For the next x seconds, Nita's bear gets a x% shield against damage.
description.Spark Plug: Jessie triggers a shockwave from her turret, slowing down all enemies within its area of effect.
description.Recoil Spring: Scrappy's attack speed is doubled for x seconds.
description.Sticky Syrup Mixer: Barley drops a sticky concoction that leaves a puddle, slowing down all enemies that make contact with it.
description.Herbal Tonic: Barley throws a healing potion at nearby allies that creates an area that heals for x health per second.
description.Popping Pincushion: Spike shoots x waves of needles in all directions, dealing x damage per hit.
description.Life Plant: Spike grows a large cactus with x health to give cover to friendlies. If destroyed, the cactus bursts, and all nearby friendlies recover x health.
description.Multiball Launcher: Rico blasts waves of bouncy bullets in all directions.
description.Bouncy Castle: Rico's next attack will heal him for x health from each bounce of a projectile.
description.Rocket Laces: Brock blasts the ground below him and propels himself into the air. The explosion deals x damage to nearby enemies.
description.Rocket Fuel: Brock's next attack is a mega rocket that is bigger, badder, faster and destroys walls.
description.T-Bone Injector: Bull instantly rejuvenates himself for x health.
description.Stomper: Bull can interrupt his Super charge and slow all nearby opponents with a massive stomp for x seconds.
description.Silver Bullet: Colt's next attack is a powerful shot that deals as much damage as x of his regular bullets, while going through obstacles and opponents alike.
description.Fast Forward: Shelly dashes ahead, skipping a few unnecessary steps!
description.Clay Pigeons: On activation, for the next x seconds Shelly's main attacks focus the fire to a smaller area with an increased range.
